games.name: Dark Souls I
games.description: An action RPG set in a dark fantasy world filled with challenging enemies and intricate lore.

games.name: DarkSouls II Scholar of the First Sin
games.description: The enhanced edition of Dark Souls II, featuring improved graphics, additional content, and rebalanced gameplay.

games.name: Dark Souls III
games.description: The epic conclusion to the Dark Souls series, offering intense combat, a rich world, and deep lore.

games.name: Elden Ring Neightreign + DLC
games.description: An expansive open-world action RPG developed by FromSoftware.

games.name: Hytale
games.description: An upcoming sandbox RPG that combines block-building with adventure and exploration.

games.name: Tenebyss
games.description: A deep-sea exploration RPG where players navigate underwater worlds filled with mystery and danger.

games.name: Ghost of Tsushima
games.description: An open-world action-adventure game set in feudal Japan, focusing on the story of a samurai defending his homeland.

mods.name: The God
mods.description: He watches you, he knows everything about you, he's good to you until you make too many mistakes

mods.name: Arrzee's Superhero Multiverse
mods.description: A Palladium addon featuring suits and powers from Arrzee's Enhanced SMP inspired by Marvel, DC and Superhero lore!

mods.name: Warriors Of World 2
mods.description: Epic Fight add-on. New weapons and armor with exciting abilities.

mods.name: Alien Evolution
mods.description: A Ben 10 mod for Palladium! Transform into a variety of high quality aliens with unique moves and playstyles!

mods.name: Nycto
mods.description: A Palladium addon that adds a variety of superhero suits and powers from different universes!

mods.name: Epic Fight - Wapons of Miracles
mods.description: Changes Minecraft Combat into Souls-Like Combat.

mods.name: Weapons of Miracles - Epic Fight
mods.description: Improve epicfight with more weapon, more animations, more skills, more epic and more FIGHT!

mods.name: SAbyssal Ascent !!!Mod Pack!!!
mods.description: A Modpack utilising immersive portals stacking 12 different dimensions vertically, each with their own ecosystem, resources, biodiversity and challenges, and you spawn at the very bottom of this world,.

mods.name: Ninjago: Legacy of Spinjitzu
mods.description: A mod adding the world of Lego Ninjago to Minecraft
